document.full_text: on monday, for the first time since computer rankings started nearly four decades ago, no american man or woman will be ranked in the top 10 in singles.
document.title: on tennis: a regrettable first for u.s. tennis
lines_and_colors: on monday, for the first time since computer rankings started nearly four decades ago, no american man or woman will be ranked in the top 10 in singles.
